column5: What should it cost to have a motor rigged, (installed) on a boat? Gauges and controls as well. All parts supplied, just the labour portion.
Between $100 and $5,000. or more.  What do you want installed and on what?
When I was looking at boats most places were adding about $500 for rigging.  I was looking at boats in the 50hp range.
When I bought my new boat about five years ago, they charged me about $300 to remove my 70hp motor and controls from my old boat and rig on the new one.
$300 Albert,that is a pretty standard rate for what your doing.
Hirks right, I had a 225 yammy rigged for $325
Thanks guys! I needed this info for a negotiation.....
